column4: hi, anyone knows a repository with a mp3 encoder enabled mencoder ?
comes with all that stuff mp3 dvd codecs flash java
yea they made all those extra codecs and stuff easy to install now
no I don't think this enable mp3 encoding in ffmpeg , that's what mencoder needs
yea it instal lame mp3 ffmpeg uses that
no because I already have lame
then ffmpeg should do mp3 fine
ffmpeg needs to be compiled with lame support
I ealready have lame, so it doesn't work
looks like sound jucer does mp3
it uses the gs steamer codecs
